attributes.description: Specify the range within which the pump maintains optimal performance.
attributes.name: Operating Pressure Range

attributes.description: Detail the hydraulic oil required for operation.
attributes.name: Hydraulic Fluid Type

attributes.description: Define the expected service interval based on operational hours.
attributes.name: Maintenance Interval

attributes.description: Specify the operating temperature withstand capability.
attributes.name: Temperature Tolerance

attributes.description: Identify the pump control integration features.
attributes.name: Integration Capability

designScenario.description: The Hydraulic Pump is designed to serve as a crucial component in aviation hydraulic systems by converting mechanical power into regulated hydraulic energy efficiently, remaining durable under extreme conditions, and featuring advanced safety mechanisms for operational reliability.
designScenario.name: Aviation-Grade Hydraulic Pump

details.description: Enable efficient energy conversion from mechanical to hydraulic forms minimizing losses.
Operate under a defined pressure range while maintaining stability under varying demands.
Employ built-in diagnostics to preemptively indicate maintenance requirements or failures.
Include redundant fail-safe operations to ensure pressure stability under failure.
Provide sustained operations even under extreme temperature variances.

relationships.description: The pump relies on an external mechanical driver.
The pump incorporates an integral filter to maintain fluid cleanliness.
The secondary pump manages overflow or backup pressure regulation.

systemComponents.description: Main unit responsible for hydraulic pressure generation from a mechanical input.
systemComponents.name: Hydraulic Pump

subComponents.description: Provides rotational or reciprocating action for pump operation.
subComponents.name: Driver Mechanism

subComponents.description: Maintains and regulates hydraulic fluid used by the system.
subComponents.name: Internal Fluid Regulator

systemComponents.description: Secondary unit utilized for backup operations during main pump downtime.
systemComponents.name: Auxiliary Pump

subComponents.description: Ensures primary functionalities are supplemented under varying demands.
subComponents.name: Auxiliary Drive Linkage

comments.body: This valueType represents the hydraulic capacity.

constraintBlocks.expression: Maintenance cycle should not exceed 600 flight hours
constraintBlocks.name: MaintenanceConstraint

rag_context: The Pump System is designed to efficiently convert mechanical energy into high-pressure hydraulic fluid, ensuring rapid response for critical flight maneuvers. It features aerospace-grade hydraulic oil for optimal performance, high integration with aircraft control systems, and a maintenance cycle of 600 flight hours. The system emphasizes energy conversion efficiency, rapid pressure generation, fail-safe operation, and durability with self-diagnostic capabilities.
